name: markitdown/packages 模块
description: [模块级] markitdown 项目的 packages 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/microsoft/markitdown

genes.title: packages 模块说明
genes.content:
```

If you are using Anaconda, you can create a virtual environment with:

```bash
conda create -n markitdown python=3.12
conda activate markitdown
```
